TopicTitle: Do you play Rome 2: Total War?

Articles.Content:
I got the Achievement "Cut them ... all!" and Rostra: D

I do not know whether your computer is so stupid or just playing dumb, recently fleet of 20 vessels attacked my 10 computer had a terrible bad luck because my whole fleet not counting the admiral, they were artillery ships effect was such that the computer has lost 1,200 soldiers somewhere and I 0 : D

And I was afraid that I will lose the fleet because at the beginning of the indicator showed that the computer has a great advantage.

This fleet built mainly with the intention of using it as a support for the infantry at capturing the coastal cities

Edited May 29, 2014 by Pawelk198604
that game is a extremely horriblely optimized game you need a R9 290 or a GTX 780 Ti
